name: Uomo d'Armi
description:
FLAVOR:

  • All-around fighter

  • Tactics, benefits from/for others nearby

  • Selflessness?

WEAPONS:

  • All (including polearms) except great, heavy ranged and firearms

  • All armor, shields and helms

ENGAGEMENT:

  • Medium amount of medium dice (or maybe 2x what you get from your gear?)

  • Medium amount of success options, nothing extreme (fancy or brutal)

  • So like the mestiere provides no engagement dice, but does provide success options?

ABILITIES

  • Tactics, defending others (mine fighter class)

  • Ways to regain endurance?
